name: generate_reel_caption
description: Generate a short, emotional caption for Reels or short-form videos related to healing music or cinematic night themes.

reel_topic.description: The core topic of the reel (e.g., midnight rain, loneliness, insomnia, peace)

emotion.description: The mood or feeling the reel evokes (e.g., dreamy, melancholic, warm)

cta.description: Call-to-action to engage viewers (e.g., Save if this is you, Tag someone, Listen with headphones)
